cab.content: JtlHS^Qcumetit is the Property ofHis Britannic SVfajesty/s Government//WM&ry Secret.1106From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,7th October 1919.(Received 8th.) 13635. 7th October. Malleson wires 5th October : " From two different sources I have learnt that Herat Shrine custodians have returned home^ Their failure to get to Bokhara, Khiva, &e, is variously attributed to Bolshevik suspicion and jealousy of the Afghan Mission now in Ktislik. Governor of Herat said to have severely reproached Mullas for their failure."
